item.title: Cleveland Force SC and Internationals SC Boys Academy Join Boys Elite Clubs National League
item.description: Our Boys Academy Program is excited to announce our acceptance into the Elite Clubs National League (ECNL) for the 2021-2022season under the Cleveland Force SC banner.

item.title: Congrats to CFSC (MLS NEXT) alumni, Andrew Cooke, for Patriot League Player Of The Week!
item.description: We always are looking forward to seeing the next generation of CFSC players moving forward to the academic institutions of theirdreams, while finding athletic success!

item.title: CFSC JOINS GIRLS ELITE CLUBS NATIONAL LEAGUE FOR 2021-2022 SEASON
item.description: Cleveland Force Soccer Club is excited to announce our acceptance into the Girls Elite Clubs National League (ECNL) for the2021-2022 season to begin August 2021 for the U13-U19 age groups. The ECNL will provide our top female athletes with the nationâ€™shighest level of competition and will serve as the top of our player pathway pyramid with the ECNL-Regional league just below....

item.title: Denny Ciornei announced as CFSC Goalkeeping Director
item.description: The addition of Coach Denny is an example of our commitment to providing an unparalleled club structure for all members/positionswithin the organization. Coach Denny shares our commitment and passion to empower intelligent, humble, and hard-working boys and girls,who approach goals with a positive outlook, both on and off the field. We are blessed to have him join and look forward to seeing thegrowth of our keepers and the culture of the program...

item.title: Cleveland Force SC Announces Intention to Join USL League Two
item.description: Youth soccer organization Cleveland Force SC today announced its intention to purchase a USL League Two franchise in the coming years.As one of the top youth development clubs in Ohio, Force SC leadership is seeking to add both a senior team in USL League Two and anelite pre-professional side competing in the USL Academy League to the apex of its development pyramid...
